column5: 3100 SF Super Bowl rental home 5 mins from Maxim party at Smart Centre. 25 mins away from NRG Stadium. Sleeps 10. Spacious 4 bedroom, 3 1/2 bath home in safe, quiet golf course community. Master bedroom includes King Tempur-Pedic mattress. Large master bath with oversized tub and separate shower. 3 remaining bedrooms include Queen-sized mattresses. Upstairs play area for children. State of the art security system includes high end outdoor cameras covering the entire perimeter of the home.
column8: Super Bowl home 5 mins from Maxim party 25 to NRG
